Desc.entry: Provides educational fun activities, camping, hiking and international exchange visits for the following age groups: Elfins 6-9 years, Pioneers 10-12 years, Ventures 13-15 years, DF 16-20 years. Works on co-operative principles and has a democratic structure. Family participation is encouraged. Holds 1 week summer camp in July/August. There are 2 sections, Derwent District and Porter and Don District. A registered charity.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
